items.content_html: This project is a React application for managing and visualizing large datasets with optimized performance and a responsive user interface. Built using React with react-table for table management and Chakra UI for a flexible and lightweight design system, the app provides seamless data interactions and editing features in an intuitive interface.
items.title: fantom26/advanced-table: This project is a React application for managing and visualizing large datasets with optimized performance and a responsive user interface. Built using React with react-table for table management and Chakra UI for a flexible and lightweight design system, the app provides seamless data interactions and editing features in an intuitive interface.
